revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Telefonica |model=Smart Home Gateway |revision=(Picasso) |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/17/2013 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model=NA930 |manuf_rev=ZW2G |availability=now |type=access point, IoT hub |fcc_id=P27NA930ZW2G, RI7GE910 |ic_id=5131A-GE910 |pcb_id=ANZ00B-1.6 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=ESMT |fla1_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT6TU64M16GG-AC |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035-A |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=Z-Wave Chip;Sigma Designs (Zensys);ZW0301;;1; |flags=Z-Wave, GSM, GPRS |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Smart Home Gateway}}
"ANZ00B-1.6" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :Radial capacitors on the FCC EUT seem to be '''Lelon''' branded.
There is a [http://www.telit.com/en/products/gsm-gprs.php?p_ac=show&p=121 '''Telit''' GE910-QUAD] cellular modem (GSM/GPRS, 2.5G) :module on the board (FCC ID: RI7GE910, IC ID: 5131A-GE910)
The power adapter shown is a '''Sunny''' SYS1381-1212-W2 :(100-240VAC ~ 50-60Hz, 0.5A -> 12VDC, 1.0A).
{{see also|SerComm NA900}} :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/P27NA900A P27NA900A]
